positions.subtitle: Students'‚Äã Alumni Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs & Branding, Team Students'‚Äã Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute. We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meets, Guest lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship Programme to meet our objective.Appointed as the Coordinator, accountable for the initiatives proposed and undertaken by Students‚Äô Alumni Cell. Part of the apex executive body of the Students Alumni Cell that leads the student members, creative team and associates.
positions.title: Coordinator
positions.description_html:
Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs & Branding, Team Students'‚Äã Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute. We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meets, Guest lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship Programme to meet our objective.

recommendations: Rajesh Agrawal ‚ÄúShikha is just awesome leader. Having interacted with her for past 6-7 months for the IIT KGP Alumni meet, where she and her team must have called at least 2000 alumni (multiple times) to get in touch. Then ensuring that they are able to make, and once they start their journey from home, to the day they head back to home.. no stone are left unturned. The arrangements for room, transportation, food, photography, events etc nothing was left unplanned. The whole program was such well orchestrated that best of event management companies can learn from them I went to institute after 25 years, she and her team ensured I feel homely, safe. Really appreciate her patience, her commitment, her ownership ü•áü•á‚Äù

projects: [{"title":"Open IIT Case Study","start_date":"Apr 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"For better inventory management, should consider Demand Forecasting Approach.Redesigning and upgrading the inventories through new technologies, say using GPS, deploying radio frequency identification etc. leads to more accuracy and efficiency.Along with human capital, investing in AI base ML models Forecasting techniques .Re- Modelling existing models and using new algorithms .Integration of traditional methods with new technologies."},{"title":"Open IIT Data Analytics","start_date":"Mar 2021","end_date":"Mar 2021","description":"‚Ä¢ Secured bronze in open IIT Data Analytics where a problem statement was given which was based on classification problem.‚Ä¢ The problem statement was about the record label who wants to maximize his revenue by buying tracks according to popularity. ‚Ä¢ Applied model RANDOM CLASSIFIER with SMOTE to obtain the results and then used k-fold cross validation to avoid overfitting"},{"title":"Indian Case Challenge","start_date":"Dec 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"Investigated about Jindal Stainless Operations and it's Domestic Market. Suggested Opportunities Overseas and Key for Growth and improvements by solving logistical problems faced by the company. Also suggested about the E-Commerce and using Digitization as a mean to solve problems."},{"title":"Indian Case Challenge","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Jan 2020","description":"Successfully Investigated a case study project organized by Business club IIT Kharagpur in association with Kshitij 2020. The case study was based on the downfall of Boeing 737 Max 8 due to Two accidents during flight, killing many people. The case study gives guidance and corrective measures to be taken by Boeing which can bring it back again in the mainstream and avoid such terrible incidents in the upcoming future."}]
